full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Furniture Chairs {#tender-notice-furniture-chairs}
### English
#### Tender Details {#tender-details}
* **Reference Number:** WS4457792757-Doc4476814630
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4457792757
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Public Date:** March 7, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 22, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 29, 2024

#### Tender Information {#tender-information}
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Delivery Details {#delivery-details}
* **Region of Delivery:** Manitoba

#### Contact Information {#contact-information}
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** Schultz, Kristen (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [kristen.schultz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristen.schultz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Description {#tender-description}
The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating to Winnipeg, MB. The tender covers a requirement to be solicited amongst the General Stream (SA holders) and has been extended until March 22, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT.
